content: aemonium is a colorful hot pad designed to lighten up your table it s so easy to make that you can have one different for each season the pattern can be adapted into a potholder - instructions inside the pattern is designed for the lovely létt lopi icelandic yarn but can easily be adapted to any yarn or yarns if you want to crochet 2 or 3 strands of a lighter yarn together just be sure that it s a 100% wool tread with no superwash treatment so it can be felt this is a perfect last-minute gift
